content:
Shortly after the recent iOS 9.3.1 update to fix a link issue and the major iOS 9.3 update with new features, Apple has released a new iOS 9.3.2 update for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch. Apple has also released the first watchOS 2.2.1 betas for developers to test with Apple Watch.

The update appears to be propagating now so be patient if you’re a developer and don’t see the new releases just yet.
author: Zac Hall
title: Apple releases first iOS 9.3.2 + watchOS 2.2.1 betas for developers
